## CobuildConfiguration.cobuildWithoutCacheAllowed property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

If true, operations can opt into leveraging cobuilds without restoring from the build cache. Operations will need to us the allowCobuildWithoutCache flag to opt into this behavior per phase.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly cobuildWithoutCacheAllowed: boolean;
```
